introduce:
ilokesto[iloˈkɛsto], which means "toolbox" in Esperanto,

is a collection of various libraries for TypeScript and React.

caro-kann.description: A concise and predictable global state management library — low learning curve yet capable of managing large-scale application state reliably and with high performance.

sicilian.description: A lightweight and flexible form state management tool — simplifies validation, error handling, and async submission to keep complex form flows clean and maintainable.

grunfeld.description: A declarative, lightweight dialog library — provides a Promise-based API that handles modal/prompt flows plus focus and accessibility concerns, making complex interactive UIs simple and safe to implement.

utilinent.description: A lightweight library that adapts Solid's declarative control-flow APIs for React — express conditional rendering and complex view flows declaratively to improve readability and reusability.

common-resolver.description: A small utility that unifies schema validators (Yup, Zod, Superstruct) behind a consistent adapter API, standardizes error shapes, and simplifies integration or migration.
